item.title: Continuous Delivery
item.description: Release Pipeline Everything starts from a commit, typically for a feature development. This should automatically trigger a build job on our CI server; the unit tests is also included in the job. a. If any automation test needed for the feature, the automation cases can be implemented by tester in parallel. If everything is OK, we can deploy everything in stage, this step is currently manual. Note: the deploying steps
